entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Native AOT]Problem with polymorphic calls #114835
  • It's possible to change the string object in a safe context. #114834
  • Allow file watching for rooted paths within PhysicalFileProvider #114833
  • [API Proposal]: Add non-overflowing widening sum to Vector types #114832
  • [Analyzer]: Flag non-productive uses of `RegexOptions.NonBacktracking`. #114831

Closed

  • JIT: We can remove `getTypeForBoxOnStack` #114204
    10.0.0
  • ClientWebSocket.SendAsync() api remarks section un clear on limitation and undefined behavior #114816
  • `libnethost.lib` contains LTCG objects again #113183
    9.0.x
  • [Android] System.Security.Cryptography.Tests RSA signature validation failures #114772

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the amd64 cross-DAC stack unwinding #114836
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add custom exception handlers to generated COM wrappers #114828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove getTypeForBoxOnStack from jit interface #114754
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Deref pointer in minipal/time #114598
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [clr-interp] Add support for virtual method calls #114529
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [browser] Preload dotnet.js #114534
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2690943 #114807
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [release/9.0-staging] [wasm] Read messages from binlog if process output is missing build finished message #114676
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.x
  • Replace compiler specific options with C++ `thread_local` keyword #114660
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove unsafe code from Http KnownHeaders #114757
    area-System.Net.Http, reduce-unsafe, 10.0.0
  • Change CrlBuilderTests to use a static RSA key with better support. #114804
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 10.0.0

Updated

  • [RuntimeAsync] Merge from labs, all except JIT #114675
    area-VM-coreclr, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • [TEST] No-op comment change #114048
    NO-REVIEW, test-enhancement, area-VM-coreclr
  • Abolish PSPSym from ABI #114630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Create transport package and rename the cdac reader #114812
    needs-area-label
  • Fixes grammar in comments for Gen2GcCallback.cs #114674
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [browser] Use OverrideHtmlAssetPlaceholders=true in browser template #113654
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Interpreter GC info stage 3: Report locals to the GC #114469
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Improve the functionality of LoongArch64 R2R #114666
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Includes type forwarding for System.Text.Unicode.Utf8 to the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory library #111292
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [Android] Run CoreCLR library tests on Android #114148
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • [Mobile] Upload build log artifacts for reporting build times in perflab #113469
    tenet-build-performance, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline, 10.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some bugs to make NativeAOT stable. #114618
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Learn what's failing about the OSSL tests on new mac queues #114163
    area-System.Security
  • Add CPUID for AvxVnniInt8 and AvxVnniInt16 #113956
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
